about_the_game:
Jans Tokenpack 14 - Goblins

Goblins are one of my favourite villains in fantasy games. They are mischievous, funny, but can also be mean, and very dangerous in large groups.
The Goblins are not alone, they brought their close relatives, the Hobgoblins. They are meaner, smarter, stronger, and more organized. They are formidable warriors.
More rare, but also even more dangerous are the Bugbears. They love to bully their smaller goblinoid relatives around. These big hairy beasts can wipe out whole parties of adventurers!
I've included Worg wolves that can be used as mounts and pets.
Enjoy this token pack and may your adventures be great!
  • Goblin
  • Goblin Boss
  • Goblin Archer
  • Hobgoblin
  • Hobgoblin Captain
  • Hobgoblin Warlord
  • Hobgoblin Caster
  • Hobgoblin Shadow
  • Hobgoblin Archer
  • Bugbear
  • Bugbear Chief
  • Bugbear Javelin
  • Goblin Jester
  • Worg
  • Rat
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jan Loos

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

Jans Tokenpack 14 - Goblins

Goblins are one of my favourite villains in fantasy games. They are mischievous, funny, but can also be mean, and very dangerous in large groups.
The Goblins are not alone, they brought their close relatives, the Hobgoblins. They are meaner, smarter, stronger, and more organized. They are formidable warriors.
More rare, but also even more dangerous are the Bugbears. They love to bully their smaller goblinoid relatives around. These big hairy beasts can wipe out whole parties of adventurers!
I've included Worg wolves that can be used as mounts and pets.
Enjoy this token pack and may your adventures be great!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
